title: Can I make dua to remove him from her life & Break them up if she's blinded by his love?
transcript: Bailey from Bangladesh The guy is really bad and also characterless but she's in love with him and can't leave him and I can't leave her alone as she's like my sister. So can I make dua to Allah that remove the boy from her mind and life and remove her from the boy's mind and life or will it be breaking ties? Can I make this specific dua? Yes, you can make that dua inshaAllah without any problem.
